title: Repairing Client
body: So, I was in champ select and loading to the match then it crashed. I was like " well thats normal". then when the window came up, it says repairing client . its was like 5000mb. but when i try to come back it says i was a leaver. so its not my fault.

replies.body:
You definitely didn't leave intentionally when the client crashes on the loading screen or something similar, but your teammates were still left without a full team which is the main reason for any LPQ's you might get. Although, it doesn't look like this account has a punishment for anything so you should be okay. 

It's not that "it was your fault the game crashed", but this is more of a sign that you need to fix up those crashes before it gets worse. Be sure to do some general troubleshooting since it's a little hard to know exactly what went wrong there. I'd start with a quick repair and test it in a custom/practice match, and if that doesn't help check out the other steps in the [**crash guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974) or let me know a little more about what happened when you crashed (eg error codes/crash messages/when it crashed).
